<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: for (Iterator<SearchResult> iter = docSearch.iterator(); iter.hasNext(); ) {
int i = 0;
while (i < 50) {
iter.next();
i++;
}
}
<<<explanation>>>: You can use a for loop to iterate through the LinkedList and an iterator to keep track of the current element. Inside the loop, you can call the next() method on the iterator to move to the next element in the list. To break out of the loop after 50 iterations, you can use a while loop with a condition that checks the value of i.
